StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.name: [sp_GetDailyReportAc.vityObjec.vesMCRC]
StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.body:
@Organiza.onID int, @FiscalYear int, @Month int AS
SELECT REGION.ORGANIZATION_ID, SUM(COALESCE(AO.CONTRACT_OBJECTIVE, 0)) AS CONTRACT_OBJECTIVE, --- dbo.GetContractObjec.ve (RSS.ORGANIZATION_ID, @FiscalYear, @Month, RSS.ORGANIZATION_TYPE) AS CONTRACT_OBJECTIVE, SUM(COALESCE(AO.NWAS_OBJECTIVE, 0)) AS NWAS_OBJECTIVE, SUM(COALESCE(AO.INTERVIEWS_OBJECTIVE, 0)) AS INTERVIEWS_OBJECTIVE, REGION.NAME FROM RECRUITING_ORGANIZATION MCRC INNER JOIN ORGANIZATION_MAP OM2 ON (MCRC.ORGANIZATION_ID = OM2.PARENT_ORGANIZATION_ID AND MCRC.ORGANIZATION_ID = @Organiza.onID) INNER JOIN RECRUITING_ORGANIZATION REGION ON (REGION.ORGANIZATION_ID = OM2.CHILD_ORGANIZATION_ID) INNER JOIN ORGANIZATION_MAP OM ON (REGION.ORGANIZATION_ID = OM.PARENT_ORGANIZATION_ID) INNER JOIN RECRUITING_ORGANIZATION DISTRICT ON (DISTRICT.ORGANIZATION_ID = OM.CHILD_ORGANIZATION_ID AND DISTRICT.ORGANIZATION_TYPE = 'D' AND DISTRICT.ISOPEN = 'Y') INNER JOIN ORGANIZATION_MAP OM1 ON (DISTRICT.ORGANIZATION_ID = OM1.PARENT_ORGANIZATION_ID) INNER JOIN RECRUITING_ORGANIZATION RS ON (RS.ORGANIZATION_ID = OM1.CHILD_ORGANIZATION_ID AND RS.ORGANIZATION_TYPE = 'RS' AND RS.ISOPEN = 'Y') LEFT OUTER JOIN ACTIVITY_OBJECTIVE AO ON (RS.ORGANIZATION_ID = AO.ORGANIZATION_ID AND AO.FISCAL_YEAR = @FiscalYear AND AO.MONTH = @Month) GROUP BY REGION.ORGANIZATION_ID, REGION.NAME ORDER BY REGION.NAME
